HowItWorks.section_description: Get your essay graded in three easy steps
HowItWorks.step1_description: Paste your essay along with the assignment brief and rubric. Our system accepts any essay format.
HowItWorks.step2_description: Three independent AI models grade your essay in parallel, ensuring balanced and accurate feedback.
HowItWorks.step3_description: Receive a detailed grade range, strengths analysis, and specific improvement suggestions.

Features.section_title: Everything You Need for Better Grades
Features.section_description: Instant, accurate feedback that helps you improve before you submit
Features.feature1_description: Three independent AI models grade your essay in parallel. Outliers are detected and excluded for accuracy.
Features.feature2_description: Get a grade range, not just a single number. See exactly where your essay excels and where it needs work.
Features.feature3_description: Upload your assignment rubric and our AI grades against it, just like your professor would.
Features.feature4_description: No more waiting. Get comprehensive feedback in under 5 minutes, any time of day.
Features.feature5_description: No subscriptions. Just buy credits when you need them. One credit = one essay graded.
Features.feature6_description: Your essays are never stored, shared, or used for training. Grade with confidence.

Testimonials.section_description: See what students are saying about MarkM8
Testimonials.testimonial1_quote: MarkM8 helped me understand exactly where my essay was weak. The feedback was specific and actionable.
Testimonials.testimonial2_quote: I used to stress about whether my essays were good enough. Now I get instant feedback before submitting.
Testimonials.testimonial3_quote: The three AI models approach gives me confidence the grade is accurate. Saved me so much time.

Pricing.section_title: Pay Per Essay, Not Per Month
Pricing.section_description: No subscriptions. Buy credits when you need them. One credit = one essay graded.
Pricing.price_note: No subscription. Pay only when you need it.

FAQ.section_description: Everything you need to know about MarkM8
FAQ.question1: How does the AI grading work?
FAQ.answer1: MarkM8 uses three independent AI models to grade your essay in parallel. Each model evaluates your work against your rubric, then we use consensus scoring to provide an accurate grade range. Outliers are automatically detected and excluded.
FAQ.question2: Is my essay stored or shared?
FAQ.answer2: No. Your essay is processed in real-time and immediately deleted after grading. We never store, share, or use your essays for AI training. Your academic work remains completely private.
FAQ.answer3: Our triple AI consensus approach provides grades that closely align with university standards. By using three models and excluding outliers, we achieve more reliable results than single-model systems.
FAQ.question4: What types of essays can I submit?
FAQ.answer4: MarkM8 works with any type of academic essay - argumentative, analytical, research papers, literature reviews, and more. Just paste your essay, assignment brief, and rubric for the most accurate results.
FAQ.answer5: Most essays are graded in under 3 minutes. Complex or longer essays may take up to 5 minutes. You'll see real-time status updates while your essay is being analyzed.
FAQ.question6: What if I disagree with the grade?
FAQ.answer6: You can regrade any essay using another credit. Each grading is independent, so you may get slightly different feedback. The grade range we provide accounts for natural variation in assessment.
